title: TVLine Items: Mary-Louise Parker Visits Elsbeth, Hulu Orders Mindy Kaling Comedy and More
description: Mary-Louise Parker is getting caught up in a deadly throuple on Elsbeth. The Weeds vet will guest-star in an upcoming episode of CBS’ Good Wife spinoff as a decluttering guru who murders her husband to keep the third in their throuple all to herself, our sister site Variety reports. Additionally, David Alan Grier (St. Denis […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: Blue Bloods Offshoot Ordered to Series, Sending Donnie Wahlberg’s Danny to a New City
description: CBS on Tuesday afternoon announced a series order for a “Blue Bloods Universe expansion” starring series vet Donnie Wahlberg. Boston Blue, as the offshoot is tentatively titled, finds Wahlberg’s Danny Reagan taking a position with the Boston PD. There, he will be partnered with Detective Lena Peters, the eldest daughter of a prominent law enforcement […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Forget Anthony, Extracted’s REAL Villain is Austin
description: Now that Extracted's spoiled brat has left the series, we need to discuss the real villain of the series: Ashley's husband. Check it out! The post Forget Anthony, Extracted’s REAL Villain is Austin appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Jasmine Blu

title: Blue Bloods Spinoff Scores Series Order at CBS: Who’s Returning?
description: Blue Bloods lives! CBS has picked up a spinoff of Blue Bloods with a straight-to-series order. Get ALL the scoop. The post Blue Bloods Spinoff Scores Series Order at CBS: Who’s Returning? appeared first on TV Fanatic.
